name: Sanctuary (Wiloux, wildegom, Franci_Algera, Djarlem, Made-N-H3AVEN, Raysoul, Shribip, Nibeliel)
name_original: Sanctuary (Wiloux, wildegom, Franci_Algera, Djarlem, Made-N-H3AVEN, Raysoul, Shribip, Nibeliel)
description:
Sanctuary is a 3D game based on Space Invaders but reskinned as a relaxing and poetic experience. You play as Mai a dancer that wants to protect her sanctuary from water spirits.

Voiced by  Misele Hoang.
